person_say: I've been stuck with no ideas for my writing. I really hope you can help me find some inspiration.
animal_say: Are you looking for a way to organize your thoughts, or do you just need a bit of creative encouragement? I know friends who can help with both!

person_say: I definitely need a bit of creative encouragement. Any suggestions on how I can get started?
animal_say: There’s a buzzing bee named Bizy who specializes in procrastination and can help spark your creativity! Would you like to meet her and get those ideas flowing?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds wonderful! I would love to get some help to spark my creativity and get those ideas flowing.
animal_say: Buzzing in with joy! Here’s Bizy, ready to inspire you and help shake those creative cobwebs loose. Let’s get started on this creative adventure!
